title: Track
name: Track
description:
A Map by Agmachine

A map of individual travelers favourite places in New Zealand.

properties.name: Bluff Hill
properties.description: Posted by AgmachineGreat view of the port. Watch the container ships being loaded and unloaded. How do they organise those containers in the ship\'s hold so that they can unload them in the right port?

properties.name: Cameron Road
properties.description: Posted by AgmachineThe year 1974. Dark Side of the Moon, Tea for the Tillerman, Abraxas. Never been better.

properties.name: Cape Reinga
properties.description: Posted by AgmachineThe end of the road. Cape Reinga. Well worth the long journey.

properties.name: Cascade Saddle
properties.description: Posted by AgmachineAwesome highpoint of the track from the Dart River to the Mount Aspiring National Park.

properties.name: Coopers Beach
properties.description: Posted by Agmachine  Beautiful beaches along this stretch.

properties.name: Ferry to Whitianga
properties.description: Posted by AgmachineLeave your car at Ferry Landing and take the foot passenger ferry to Whitianga.

properties.name: Golden Bay
properties.description: Posted by AgmachineWell worth the trip if you want to find somewhere to chill out.

properties.name: Hahei
properties.description: Posted by AgmachineGreat beach at Hahei with Cathedral Cove nearby. Stayed at a backpacker close to the store which was great.

properties.name: Hot Water Beach
properties.description: Posted by Agmachine  Get there at the right time with a shovel and have a sauna in the sand.

properties.name: Kinloch Lodge
properties.description: Posted by AgmachineKinloch Lodge caters for both the backpacker and bed and breakfast visitor. I reached it via the bus from Queenstown to Glenorchy and then via a short jet boat trip across the end of the lake. A beautiful place to stay. Heaven is indeed close to Paradise.

properties.name: Lake Waikaremoana
properties.description: Posted by AgmachineTravelled this road back in the 1980s. If your driving right through allow plenty of time since it takes longer than you think.

properties.name: Mangonui
properties.description: Posted by AgmachineBest fish and chips in the world. Blue cod in newspaper and a glass of chilled NZ white wine sitting on the decking. Can\'t beat it.

properties.name: Milford Sound
properties.description: Posted by AgmachineWhat can you say? Breathtaking.

properties.name: Napier
properties.description: Posted by AgmachineWatched the sun rise on the beach here to greet the year 2000.

properties.name: Poem on the Wall
properties.description: Posted by AgmachineAdjacent to the waterfront, at the back of the Irish bar, is a long low wall of about 100 yards in length. A beautiful poem is written on this wall which encapsulates the essence of the people and landscape.

properties.name: Pohara
properties.description: Posted by AgmachineGolden sands. Can be a bit crowded in summer but there are plenty of places to get away from it all around the headlands.

properties.name: Sand Dunes
properties.description: Posted by AgmachineSurprising sand dunes at the entrance to Hokianga harbour.

properties.name: Waipiro Bay
properties.description: Posted by AgmachineGravel road when I first went to Waipiro Bay but now tarmac. Great beach. Stay at the remote backpacker at the south end of the beach in the trees. Need four wheel drive for access. Only two rooms when I went. Unforgettable experience.

properties.name: Wanaka Library
properties.description: Posted by AgmachineReally neat library. Watch the trout in the clear water of the adjacent stream.
